summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 27, 2019, listing staff positions and assignments for various shifts and units. The document appears to be a routine prison staffing schedule.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Assignments
events.description: Routine assignment of correctional staff to various posts and shifts at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated July 27, 2019.

The roster lists various prison posts and shifts including control rooms, housing units (5 North, 5 South, 7 North, 7 South, 9 North, SHU units, 10 South, 11 North, 11 South), visitation, sanitation, and special assignments.
The document shows routine prison operations with no direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein or any specific inmates.
The timing (July 27, 2019) places this document approximately two weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death in the same facility on August 10, 2019.
The document includes standard prison staffing categories like day off, sick leave, and various shift times from 00:00 to 00:00.
